lead_paragraph: The gunman in the mass shootings at the Washington Navy Yard, Aaron Alexis, had a history of violent outbursts, was at least twice accused of firing guns in anger and was in the early stages of treatment for serious mental problems, according to court records and U.S. law enforcement officials.

headline.main: Federal Gun Laws Didn't Block Navy Yard Shooter
headline.print_headline: Federal Gun Laws Didn't Block Navy Yard Shooter
